name: Outer Realms Corrupter
flavor: A shifting, formless mass seemingly made of chromatic light.

features.name: Will-Shattering Touch - Passive
features.desc: When a PC takes damage from the Corrupter, they lose a Hope.

features.name: Disgorge Reality Flotsam - Action
features.desc: Mark a Stress to spew partially digested portions of consumed realities at all targets within Close range. Targets must succeed on a Knowledge Reaction Roll or mark 2 Stress.
